newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary's forint ends weaker vs dlr, NBH basket.
newsitem.headline: Hungary's forint ends weaker vs dlr, NBH basket.

text.p: Hungary's forint eased against the dollar on Friday and remained 20 pips weaker than the central bank's resistance level (bid) due to dollar buying, traders said on Friday.
The forint closed at 181.30/35 against the U.S. unit compared with an opening of 181.09/14.
Market sources said customer orders and possibly some speculation were the main reasons why the forint left the central bank's bid.
(National Bank of Hungary (NBH) basket: 30 pct dollar + 70 pct mark. The NBH's intervention range is 4.5 percent wide.)
